Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: rusty cosens
Reviews.Content: I was a bit skeptical about ordering at first, but I'm glad i did.  This phone came with all kinds of accessories, so much different than the ones from the big cell retailers where all you get is a phone and a charger.  There were nice surprises at every turn, like a built in radio, menus that make sense, and options available where there should be.  I searched for several months to find a good rugged phone with a few bells and whistles, but not a smartphone, and at a reasonable price.  If you are sick of the crap from the big name cell companies, try this phone.  I'm picky as all getout, if it worked for me, it will work for you!  I can confirm that it works on at&t; for voice calls and voice mail, not sure about data.  I just popped in my old sim card and was ready to go.

Reviews.Title: A real "smart" phone
Reviews.Author: J. Orosz
Reviews.Content: Simple, indestructible, and effective.  If you are a fully functioning and capable human being and you don't need to depend on a portable electronic device to do your thinking for you and constantly entertain you because you're not a spoiled brainless self-important yuppie, then this the phone for you.  Is exactly as advertised, has great battery life.  Works with any network using standard size SIM.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Battery life
Reviews.Author: Jason Prince
Reviews.Content: bought this to become an emergency "house" phone in case of power outage or other emergency, and the stand by time is just fantastic, and as advertised!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: BethelBoreas "BethelBoreas"
Reviews.Content: Hubby loves it. He's hard on phones, but so far this seems to be holding its own. Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Tough!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Heyano
Reviews.Content: For a tough basic cell phone with emergency features, this is great! Some rugged conditions require a tough phone and this is the toughest phone I have ever seen.

Reviews.Title: I would recommend this phone to someone who needs durable more than sound quality.
Reviews.Author: Shannon C.
Reviews.Content: I've been using this phone for 6 months now. I love the ruggedness and waterproof features.  Battery life is excellent.  Sound quality is poor for both users--I can't hear the caller and they can't hear me--but is something I deal with because I need a durable phone.  My only other complaint is that the keypad always beeps when pressed even when the keypad is locked.  I would recommend this phone to someone who needs durable more than sound quality.  I have not tried using bluetooth ear piece which may help with sound quality.

Reviews.Title: amazing phone
Reviews.Author: gonzalo cortes cruz
Reviews.Content: this phone is for my mom, what a nice phone . i will get one for me too i loveit

Reviews.Title: DOES NOT WORK WITH AT&T;
Reviews.Author: slamdi
Reviews.Content: Warning. This phone does not work with AT&T.; Although it recognized there was a SIM, it would not allow me to make a call. The screen said Emergency Only. I tried both SIM slots. Neighter worked to make a call. My other phone was getting 4 bars of service, so it should have been getting a signal.

Reviews.Title: doesn't meet basic needs of a phone
Reviews.Author: Mom2dogs
Reviews.Content: It does not have preditive text.  Also, when someone calls only the number shows up, not the name.  Lots of tiny icons across the top that can't be seen to know what they mean.  I asked about preditive text, but apparently my model does not have it.  Some may.Will be returning it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Waterproof, Shockproof, Unlocked Cell Phone
Two (2) SIM Card Slots
Built in Flashlight
Wind Up Charger + Extra Battery
Clasp with Compass
ProductInfo.Name: Fortis Waterproof, Dustproof, Shockproof Mobile Phone (Dual SIM)
